00002 Family evaluation's wrapper.
00003 
00004 This module defines the family object.
00005 """
00006 ##

00009 #    @ingroup Engine
00010 
00011     ##
00012     #    @ingroup family
00013     #
00014 class family:
00015     """
00016     QSOS Application family wrapper for QSOS
00017     
00018     This class provides a wrapper for a family evaluation which corresponds to
00019     qscore files stored on the repository
00020     """
00021     
00022     
00023     def __init__(self,authors, dates, scores,comments):
00024         """
00025         Initializer
00026         
00027         Creates a new family object with provided parameters
00028         
00029         @param authors
00030                 A list of family's evaluation authors.
00031                 Each entry is a couple of string (name, e-mail)
00032         @param dates
00033                 Family's evaluation dates.
00034                 dates must be a couple of string (creation,validation)
00035         @param scores
00036                 Scores' dictionnary
00037                 Key entry is the element id from qsos xml
00038         @param comments
00039                 Comments' dictionnary
00040                 Key entry is the element id from qsos xml
00041         """
00042         self.authors = authors
00043         self.dates = dates
00044         self.scores = scores
00045         self.comments = comments
00046     
00047     def __getitem__(self, item) :
00048         """
00049         Accessor
00050         
00051         Getter
00052         
00053         @param self
00054                 Pointer to the object
00055         @param item
00056                 The item to get from this family. It can be :
00057                     - dateofcreation
00058                     - dateofvalidation
00059                     - authors
00060                     - element.score
00061                     - element.comment
00062             
00063         """
00064         #First case : dates
00065         if item.startswith("date") :
00066             if item.endswith("creation") :
00067                 return self.dates[0]
00068             else :
00069                 return self.dates[1]
00070         #Second case : authors
00071         elif item == "authors" :
00072             return self.authors
00073         #Default case : any item
00074         else :
00075             [key, what] = item.split(".")
00076             if what == "score" :
00077                 return self.scores[key]
00078             elif what == "comment" :
00079                 return self.comments[key]
